glosses: to condemn, frown upon, to criticize, judge

examples.translation: I condemn you for what you have done.

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish قنامق (kınamak), from Proto-Turkic *kï̄yna-. Cognate with Azerbaijani qınamaq, Chuvash хӗн (hĕn, “suffering”).
The name fell into disuse by the late Ottoman era and was revived during the language reform to replace ayıplamak (based on Arabic عَيْب (ʕayb)) and takbih etmek (based on Arabic تَقْبِيح (taqbīḥ).
